content:
Private Parties

Call us to find out about Private Water Park Rentals to make your event unique and memorable at 1-888-802-2348 x812.

Download our exclusive H2Oooohh! Party Invitations (PDF)

Group Fun

Looking for the ultimate group destination? We cover every type of group: Family Reunions, Boy or Girl Scout Troops, Youth & Adult Retreats, Motorcoach Day & Weekend Trips, Youth Groups, Summer Camps, Field Trips, Sports Teams, you name it! Our enthusiastic sales team is able to customize the perfect trip to Split Rock Resort for groups of any size. More Info on Groups
